questions.question_text:
A B2B customer has customized journeys they want to use for several key accounts they are trying to sell into.
How could Marketing Cloud Connect be used to initiate these sends when contacts for select accounts are created?

choices.D: Welcome Email Configuration on the Account Object
choices.A: Salesforce Data Entry Source on the Contact Object
choices.C: Salesforce Data Entry Source on the Account Object
choices.B: Salesforce Campaign Entry Source on the Lead Object

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters is having their regional supplier conference and wants to allow attendees to request event-specific safety notifications, schedule or room changes, and surprise pop-up sessions.
Which solution should they use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Makes more sense to me.

Selected Answer: D
it's D
The SMS messages provide more immediate communication for issues like schedule or room changes and surprise pop-up sessions. 
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mc_moc_provide_information_to_conference_attendees.htm&type=5
Feels like C and D both works, depending on desired interaction. C probably more flexible

choices.C: Smart Capture and Triggered email messaging
choices.D: Keyword opt in and SMS Messaging
choices.B: CloudPages opt in to Event Journey

discussion.content:
C is correct one cause "The Exclude FTP Users from Password Expiration field allows you to exempt FTP users from regular password changes. While this option can aid the functionality of file transfers to the Marketing Cloud, change the value frequently."
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mc_overview_security_settings.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: C
C is correct answer:
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000390420&type=1

looks like D is the correct answer.
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.mc_es_enhanced_ftp_guide.htm&type=5

SSH key authentication is only for SFTP

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) wants to import recent customer transaction data from their data warehouse into Marketing Cloud on a nightly basis. They plan to create a File Drop Automation to trigger an automation when a data file is transferred from the data warehouse to the import folder in their Enhanced FTP account.
NTO notes that user passwords expire every 90 days and they do not want to update their file transfer script on the data warehouse each time a password changes and they do not want to compromise security.
Which solution should the consultant recommend?

choices.C: Enable the 'Exclude FTP Users From Password Expiration' option in Setup > Security Settings
choices.B: Request SSH key authentication to be enabled for the FTP user and create an SSH Key in Key Management
choices.A: Contact the Marketing Cloud account representative to enable Single Sign-On Authentication using SAML
choices.D: Upload data files to Marketing Cloud using SFTP instead of FTP

choices.B: Create an exclusion list with the known email addresses.
choices.A: Create an auto-suppression list populated with the known email addresses.
choices.C: Populate a list using a query to exclude the subscriber key.
choices.D: Create an auto-suppression list populated with subscriber keys.

questions.question_text:
A customer has curated a list of known email addresses belonging to competitors. They want to ensure none of these competitors receive their emails.
What should a consultant recommend?

discussion.content: It supposes to be "Auto-Suppression list" to prevent the competitors completely receive their emails
B, because Auto-suppresion lists is more of a dynamic way to handle which email addresses should not receive email communication.

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters is interested in a solution to automate a process. They currently pull data into a spreadsheet to import into a data extension for sending.
The data warehouse can be configured to place a file daily on an SFTP.
Which three questions are relevant to determining a solution? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: there is no SQL query as data is imported from the file in the DE => there is no reason to consider if there are 5k records or not => I think, it should be A instead of B, i.e. ADE

comments.content: I think 5k refers to Query row limit

discussion.content: what is the need of knowing rows more than 5000, instead someone should know if the import fails

choices.B: Will the file have more than 5,000 rows?
choices.E: Will the data file be placed on the SFTP at the same time daily?
choices.C: Does the file have demographic data?
choices.D: Is the data file a delta or a historical file?
choices.A: Does someone need to be notified if an error happens on import?
